description: This file defines the PartnerService class which provides CRUD operations including soft-delete for Partner entities in a Java Spring application.

classes.name: PartnerService
classes.description: Service class that manages Partner entities, providing create, update, retrieve, list, and soft-delete functionalities.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Partner entity using data from PartnerCreateRequest and returns a PartnerResponse.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Partner entity identified by id with data from PartnerUpdateRequest.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Retrieves a PartnerResponse for a Partner entity identified by id.

methods.name: listByOwner
methods.description: Lists all non-deleted PartnerResponse entities for a given owner user ID.

methods.name: softDelete
methods.description: Performs a soft delete by setting the deleted flag to true on a Partner entity identified by id.
